name: Forgot your password?
description:
Your cousin instructed you to visit `http://dashboard` in a hidden message. This is both scary and intriguing and the same time. Can you find what he wanted you to see there?
(Please note that starting this challenge might take a very long time, up to a few minutes.)

tasks.name: Dashboard content
tasks.description: After you successfully pass the login form, the dashboard greets you by name and gives you a message. What does it say?
